text: Fort Kochi is a 2001 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Benny P Thomas, starring Vijayaraghavan in the lead role. ==Cast== * Vijayaraghavan * Kalabhavan Mani * Devan * Kottayam Nazeer ==References== ==External links== * Category:2001 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Fort Kochi (film)
